item.title: Eric Jackson, who led Opendoor meme rip, has a new pick he calls the 'Shopify of mortgages'
item.description: The EMJ Capital founder called Better Home "the Shopify of mortgages" and said the company is rebuilding a $15 trillion industry from scratch with AI.

item.title: St. Louis Fed President Musalem sees 'limited room' for more interest rate cuts
item.description: Musalem on Monday reiterated his support for last week's interest rate cut but said he is wary about going much further.

item.title: Big Tech companies, foreign governments scramble after Trump slaps $100,000 fee on H-1B visas
item.description: The announcement to impose a $100,000 annual fee on H-1B visas sent shockwaves through corporate America.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest premarket moves: Metsera, Compass, Kenvue, Fox and more
item.description: See which stocks are posting big moves before the bell.

item.title: China isn't begging for Nvidia anymore. Here are homegrown tech plays to watch
item.description: Perhaps the biggest outcome of the latest U.S.-China trade talks is China's greater confidence in its homegrown technology.
